choice.title: rEFIt Menu and Tools
choice.description: The rEFIt boot menu, plus maintenance tools and the EFI shell.

choice.title: rEFIt Blesser
choice.description: A StartupItem that ensures the rEFIt boot menu is always active (“blessed”), but without interfering with Safe Sleep, Firmware Updates or manual use of Startup Disk.

choice.title: rEFIt File System Drivers
choice.description: EFI drivers for the Linux file systems ‘ext2’, ‘ext3’ and ‘ReiserFS’.

choice.title: Partition Inspector
choice.description: An application to diagnose partitioning and dual-/triple-boot problems. Generates a report suitable for posting to support forums.

requirement.message: This package can only be installed on an Intel-based Mac.
